question: What do I need to include in my household income in regards to COVID-19 relief?
text:
What do I need to include in my household income in regards to COVID-19 relief?
          
        
Economic Stimulus Payments
You
do not
need to include either of the one-time economic stimulus payments listed above when reporting your income to Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.
Unemployment Compensation
You
do need
to include all unemployment compensation you may be receiving, including regular
unemployment compensation from Virginia
and additional federal unemployment benefits, when reporting your income to
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace
. This includes:

Pandemic Unemployment Assistance (PUA) - You should include any PUA you may be receiving in the income you report in your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace application.


Pandemic Unemployment Compensation (PUC) - You should include PUC, in addition to regular unemployment compensation, when reporting your income in your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace application.
